tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Trainees (
  trainee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trainee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trainee_age INT,
  trainee_gender VARCHAR(10),
  trainee_weight FLOAT,
  coach_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (coach_id) REFERENCES BoxingCoaches(coach_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingSessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE,
    session_duration INT,
    coach_id UUID REFERENCES BoxingCoaches(coach_id),
    trainee_id UUID REFERENCES Trainees(trainee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Trainees (
	trainee_id UUID,
	trainee_name VARCHAR(255),
	trainee_email VARCHAR(255),
	trainee_phone VARCHAR(15),
	coach_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Sessions (
	session_id UUID,
	session_date DATE,
	session_time TIME,
	trainee_id UUID,
	coach_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Payments (
	payment_id UUID,
	payment_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
	payment_date DATE,
	trainee_id UUID,
	coach_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Trainees (
   trainee_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
   trainee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   trainee_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
   trainee_phone VARCHAR(15),
   coach_id INTEGER REFERENCES Coaches(coach_id)
);
